info.title: SmartEM Decisions Backend API
info.description: API for accessing and managing electron microscopy data

get.description: Get API status and configuration information
Health check endpoint with actual connectivity checks
Get all acquisitions
Get a single acquisition by ID
Get all grids
Get a single grid by ID

delete.description: Delete a grid by publishing to RabbitMQ

get.description: Get all grids for a specific acquisition

schema.title: Response Get Acquisition Grids Acquisitions  Acquisition Uuid  Grids Get

post.description: Create a new grid for a specific acquisition
All squares on a grid have been registered at low mag

schema.title: Response Grid Registered Grids  Grid Uuid  Registered Post

get.description: Get all atlases
Get a single atlas by ID

delete.description: Delete an atlas by publishing to RabbitMQ

get.description: Get the atlas for a specific grid

post.description: Create a new atlas for a grid

get.description: Get all atlas tiles

schema.title: Response Get Atlas Tiles Atlas Tiles Get

get.description: Get a single atlas tile by ID

delete.description: Delete an atlas tile by publishing to RabbitMQ

get.description: Get all tiles for a specific atlas

schema.title: Response Get Atlas Tiles By Atlas Atlases  Atlas Uuid  Tiles Get

post.description: Create a new tile for a specific atlas
Connect a grid square to a tile with its position information

get.description: Get all grid squares
Get a single grid square by ID

delete.description: Delete a grid square by publishing to RabbitMQ

get.description: Get all grid squares for a specific grid

schema.title: Response Get Grid Gridsquares Grids  Grid Uuid  Gridsquares Get

post.description: Create a new grid square for a specific grid
All holes on a grid square have been registered at square mag

schema.title: Response Gridsquare Registered Gridsquares  Gridsquare Uuid  Registered Post

get.description: Get all foil holes
Get a single foil hole by ID

delete.description: Delete a foil hole by publishing to RabbitMQ

get.description: Get all foil holes for a specific grid square

schema.title: Response Get Gridsquare Foilholes Gridsquares  Gridsquare Uuid  Foilholes Get

post.description: Create a new foil hole for a specific grid square

get.description: Get all micrographs
Get a single micrograph by ID

delete.description: Delete a micrograph by publishing to RabbitMQ

post.description: Create a new micrograph for a specific foil hole
